title: How to start a building project with my $600 - Quora

response.answer_text: This is an incredibly vague question… What are you building?Is your budget only $600, or is there more capital available later?Size? Scale?Where are you building this project?Are there any special considerations, like special engineering, or specific building code issues?Compose a better question and you'll likely receive a better answer.

Project financing. If your building will be profitable you can borrow money and search for founders. But the problem is who you are… sometimes people who have no money are simply unable to make… money. You have to demonstrate you can run the project and reach profit. Can you?
